newsitem.title: USA: SAFECO files to offer 14 mln common shares.
newsitem.headline: SAFECO files to offer 14 mln common shares.

text.p: SAFECO Corp filed Tuesday with the Securities and Exchange Commission a registration to sell 14 million common shares.
Of the total amount, 11.2 million common shares are being offered in the United States and Canada and 2.8 million shares are being offered outside the United States and Canada.
The offering will be made through Smith Barney Inc.
After the offering, outstanding shares will total 140,343,401 common.
Net proceeds from the offering will be used to retire certain indebtedness incurred in connection with the planned October 1, 1997 acquisition of American States Financial Corp.
SAFECO, based in Seattle, Wash., is a property and casualty insurance company.
